comments.body: Where this Create function is used? What is the difference between this Create and CreateDisk?

The Create is an interface method for the VirtualDisk. Based on the disk parameters we either call into vdm.Create() or vmdm.Create(). 

In order to create the disk with storage policy, we use the vmdm.Create(). This method will basically make use of VM to create a disk with storage policy.

In order to create disk without any storage policy i.e a plain normal disk, we use vdm.Create(). This is a direct VC call and doesn't require any VM.
